Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; part of rosette in added white outline and added red centre; top of rim glazed; exterior: Z band between bands, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '41' is written in pencil on the exterior surface.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1097) (phase 2)
